price: Mar’yam kaa sε: ”Ɛbεyε dεn na manya abarimaa aberε a ͻbarima mfaa ne ho nkaa me, na menyε odwammanfoͻ nso?
arabic: قَالَتۡ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِي غُلَٰمٞ وَلَمۡ يَمۡسَسۡنِي بَشَرٞ وَلَمۡ أَكُ بَغِيّٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālat annā yakūnu lī ghulāmun walam yamsasnī basharun walam aku baghiyyan
